Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the events by stating that an 11-year-old girl shot and killed two armed "illegal aliens" after they broke into her home in Montana. This event did not occur.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to substantiate the events described.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the event never happened and has been debunked multiple times.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the story is true without verifying its accuracy.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating in this claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting false information and perpetuating a debunked story.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanations.
